name: Snake Game Network Workflow
description: Develop a networked version of the classic Snake game
prompt: Create a multiplayer Snake game with network capabilities allowing players to compete over a local or online network.

steps.title: Setup Project Structure
steps.prompt: Initialize a new project repository for the Snake Game with necessary directories and files for a networked multiplayer game using a suitable programming language and framework.
steps.verify_prompt: Check if the project structure is correctly set up with required files and directories. Output <promise>PASS</promise> if everything is in place.

steps.title: Implement Core Game Logic
steps.prompt: Develop the core mechanics of the Snake game including snake movement, food spawning, collision detection, and game over conditions for a single player.
steps.verify_prompt: Test the core game mechanics to ensure snake movement, food spawning, and collision detection work as expected. Output <promise>PASS</promise> if tests pass.

steps.title: Add Multiplayer Functionality
steps.prompt: Integrate multiplayer functionality to allow multiple players to join the game using network sockets or a similar technology for real-time interaction.
steps.verify_prompt: Verify that multiple players can connect and play simultaneously over the network without issues. Output <promise>PASS</promise> if successful.

steps.title: Implement Network Synchronization
steps.prompt: Ensure game state synchronization across all connected clients to maintain a consistent game environment, handling latency and data consistency.
steps.verify_prompt: Test network synchronization by simulating different network conditions and ensure game state remains consistent. Output <promise>PASS</promise> if successful.

steps.title: Create User Interface
steps.prompt: Design and implement a user-friendly interface for the Snake game, including menus for starting the game, joining multiplayer sessions, and displaying scores.
steps.verify_prompt: Check the user interface for usability and ensure all elements function correctly. Output <promise>PASS</promise> if the UI meets requirements.

steps.title: Final Testing and Debugging
steps.prompt: Perform comprehensive testing of the entire game, including multiplayer scenarios, to identify and fix any remaining bugs or performance issues.
steps.verify_prompt: Run final tests to confirm the game is stable and bug-free under various conditions. Output <promise>PASS</promise> if all tests pass.
